principles.name: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
principles.description: Biologically-inspired architectures for image recognition and computer vision, enabling efficient feature extraction through shared weights and local connectivity. Pioneered LeNet for handwriting recognition.
principles.falsification: When convolutional neural networks (cnns) leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Energy-Based Models
principles.description: Unified framework for learning probability distributions over data, supporting both discriminative and generative tasks.
principles.falsification: When energy-based models leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Self-Supervised Learning
principles.description: Learning representations from unlabeled data by predicting parts of input from other parts, reducing reliance on expensive labeled datasets.
principles.falsification: When self-supervised learning leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: World Models / JEPA (Joint Embedding Predictive Architecture)
principles.description: Predictive models that learn abstract world representations to simulate outcomes and plan actions, moving beyond pixel prediction to latent space reasoning.
principles.falsification: When world models / jepa (joint embedding predictive architecture) leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
